1.title: Pure Vitality
1.plot: A unique hybrid of Vinyasa Yoga traditions and Stott Pilates principles, this intermediate program will refresh and invigorate you. Smooth movements are combined with deep stretches and stabilizing poses to help strengthen the mind and the body.

2.title: Walk on to Total Fitness
2.plot: Walking is one of the easiest and safest ways to get fit and healthy. Follow this fun, high energy 30-minute workout led by Master Instructor Trainer for Merrithew Health & Fitness, PJ O'Clair, and see how simple it is to walk your way to a better body.

3.title: The Secret to a Strong Back
3.plot: Be good to your back with this strengthening and stabilizing workout from Stott Pilates. Improve posture and reduce pain while toning the arms and legs. You'll enjoy a more mobile, active lifestyle.

4.title: Pilates for Breast Cancer Rehabilitation
4.plot: Join Master Instructor Trainer for Merrithew Health & Fitness, PJ O'Clair, in this gentle workout designed to prepare your body for a healthy, active lifestyle.

5.title: Intense Sculpting Challenge
5.plot: Power up with an intense sculpting workout for total-body tone. Master Instructor Trainer for Merrithew Health & Fitness, Moira Merrithew, shows you how to boost muscular endurance and target specific muscle groups with precision-driven exercises.

6.title: Pilates for Men
6.plot: This is the full-body workout pro athletes swear by for overall conditioning, cross-training and a strong, injury-resistant core. Practice this powerful Stott Pilates routine a few times a week and see how it adds balance and endurance to your fitness program.

7.title: 3-D Balance
7.plot: This is the full-body workout pro athletes swear by for overall conditioning, cross-training and a strong, injury-resistant core. Practice this powerful Stott Pilates routine a few times a week and see how it adds balance and endurance to your fitness program.

imdb.plot outline: A toned and sculpted body is within reach! Add vigor to your routine and boost muscular endurance with these challenging workouts. Target your arms, legs, back and torso like never before. Pilates is the fastest-growing form of mind-body exercise in North America - and Merrithew Health & Fitness is leading the way with its premier Pilates brand, Stott Pilates. Stott Pilates is the contemporary approach to the original exercise method pioneered by the late Joseph H. Pilates. Stott Pilates is ideal for people of all ages, fitness levels and abilities - and is recognized as The Professional's Choice by studios and avid exercisers worldwide. Lindsay and Moira Merrithew are the cofounders of Merrithew Health & Fitness and have worked with many physiotherapists, and sports and fitness professionals to develop the most-respected fitness brands in the industry.
